Name: Geekwords
About the game: Geekwords is a TV series based trivia crossword game. Each puzzle references an episode of a TV episode and asks questions about events and characters from the show. Do you remember everything or do you need a hint to refresh your memory? Puzzles will remind you of critical events and characters, as well as test your knowledge of the show making it the perfect companion for re-watching the series.
